# Additional Apis Docs

## Additional APIs

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/index.md): Explore additional class libraries and APIs in .NET, including out-of-band (OOB) projects, platform-specific libraries, and private APIs.

## adodb namespace

- [Connection interface](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/adodb.connection.md): See reference information for the Connection interface in .NET. This interface is in the adodb namespace and the adodb assembly (in the adodb.dll library).
- [EventReason enum](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/adodb.eventreasonenum.md): Get information about the EventReason enumeration in .NET. This enumeration is in the adodb namespace and the adodb assembly (in the adodb.dll library).
- [EventStatus enum](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/adodb.eventstatusenum.md): Get information about the EventStatus enumeration in .NET. This enumeration is in the adodb namespace and the adodb assembly (in the adodb.dll library).

## Connection class

- [Connection class](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/connection.md): Learn about the Connection class in .NET. This class parses server responses, queue requests, and pipeline requests. It is in the System.NET namespace.
- [m_WriteList field](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/m_writelist.md): Get information about the Connection.m_WriteList field in .NET. This ArrayList field has HttpWebRequest objects that are queued up to be sent over HTTP.

## ConnectionGroup class

- [ConnectionGroup class](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/connectiongroup.md): Read about the ConnectionGroup class, which groups connections within the ServicePoint context and is used to maintain context for network resources in .NET.
- [m_ConnectionList field](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/m_connectionlist.md): Learn about the ConnectionGroup.m_ConnectionList field in .NET, which contains connection objects that serve the same URI and share values for other properties.

## ConnectStream class

- [Connection property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/system.net.connectstream.connection.md): Learn more about: ConnectStream.Connection Property

## CoreResponseData class

- [CoreResponseData class](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/coreresponsedata.md): Understand the CoreResponseData class, which represents the parsing of the HTTP headers and the response body. It is in the System.Net namespace in .NET.
- [m_ResponseHeaders field](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/coreresponsedata_m_responseheaders.md): Understand the CoreResponseData.m_ResponseHeaders field in .NET. This field is a WebHeaderCollection type that has headers associated with the server response.
- [m_StatusCode field](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/coreresponsedata_m_statuscode.md): Read about the CoreResponseData.m_StatusCode field in .NET. The field is an HttpStatusCode type that contains the status of the HTTP response.

## Exception class

- [PrepForRemoting method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/system.exception.prepforremoting.md): Review the Exception.PrepForRemoting method in .NET. The method adds the server-side stack trace to the message before the exception is rethrown at the client.

## GridViewHeaderRowPresenter class

- [FindHeaderByColumn method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/system.windows.controls.gridviewheaderrowpresenter.findheaderbycolumn.md): Learn about the private WPF method called FindHeaderByColumn.
- [MakeParentItemsControlGotFocus method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/system.windows.controls.gridviewheaderrowpresenter.makeparentitemscontrolgotfocus.md): Learn about the private WPF method called MakeParentItemsControlGotFocus.
- [PrepareHeaderDrag method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/system.windows.controls.gridviewheaderrowpresenter.prepareheaderdrag.md): Learn about the private WPF method called PrepareHeaderDrag.

## HttpWebRequest class

- [_AutoRedirects field](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/_autoredirects.md): Read about the HttpWebRequest._AutoRedirects field in .NET. This field is an Int32 value that reflects the number of redirects made for an HTTP web request.
- [_CoreResponse field](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/httpwebrequest__coreresponse.md): Read about the HttpWebRequest._CoreResponse field in .NET. This field is a CoreResponseData or Exception object containing the result of HTTP response parsing.
- [_HttpResponse field](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/additional-apis/_httpresponse.md): Understand the HttpWebRequest._HttpResponse field in .NET. This field is an HttpWebResponse type containing HTTP response details from an HTTP request.
